src:
Vruće u Minhenu: Kovač držao sastanak sa igračima, čelnici većaju o njegovoj sudbini
Čekaju se nove vesti iz Minhena

03 Nov 2019

Biće ovog dug dan za navijače i čelnike minhenskog Bajerna! Pet golova u mreži Manuela Nojera, na gostovanju Ajntrahtu, upalili su sve žive alarme u Bavarskoj. Trener Niko Kovać je i pre blamaže u Frankfurtu bio na tankom ledu, a sada je još više ugrozio sopstveni status. Posebno, što nije baš u dobrim odnosima sa Rumenigeom.
I dalje nije poznato hoće li nekadašnji reprezentativac Hrvatske nastaviti posao na klupi Bajerna. Ovog jutra bilo je veoma vruće u trening kampu Bajerna. Fotoreporteri Bilda su ovekovečili trenutak kada Niko Kovač ulazi u trening kamp. Pojavio se na radnom mestu nešto pre osam sati. Zatim je održao 30-minutni sastanak sa igračima i otišao na trening sa rezervistima.
Dakle, ništa neuobičajeno. Normalan proces posle odigrane prvenstvene utakmice. Mđeutim, Bild je došao do saznanja da uprava Bajerna trenutno sastanči i razgovarao o narednim koracima.
Od kada je trener Bajerna Niko Kovač je pod velikim pritiskom.  Izvršni potpredsednik Karl Hajnc Rumenige i sportski direktor Hasan Salihamidžić nisu imali milosti ni pre gostovanja Ajntrahtu. Deo igrača je, takođe, nezadovoljan dosadašnjom sezonom, jer smatraju da su partije daleko od renomea Bajerna.
Bavarci trenutno imaju četiri boda manje od Mehengladbaha i zauzimaju četvrtu poziciju u Bundesligi.

BUNDESLIGA - 10. kolo

PetakHofenhajm - Paderborn 3:0 (3:0)/Skov 2, Kaderžabek 15, Lokadija 25/
SubotaAjntraht - Bajern 5:1 (2:1)/Kostić 25, Sou 33, Abraham 49, Hintereger 61, Pasijensija 85 - Levandovski 37/ 
Leverkuzen - Menhengladbah 1:2 (1:2)/Foland 25 - Vent 18, Tiram 42/
Dortmund - Volfzburg 3:0 (0:0)/Azar 52, Gerero 58, Gece 88. penal/
RB Lajpcig - Majnc 8:0 (5:0)/Zabicer 5, Verner 30, 48, 87, Nkunku 35, Halstenberg 39, Poulsen 44, Mukijele 50/
Verder - Frajburg 2:2 (1:1)/Rašica 9, Gebre Selasije 59 - Petersen 28, 90+3/
Union Berlin - Herta 1:0 (0:0)/Polter 87. penal/

Nedelja15.30: (2,70) Fortuna Diseldorf (3,30) Keln (2,60)18.00: (3,90) Augzburg (3,50) Šalke (1,95)

text:
Hot in Munich: Blacksmith holds meeting with players, leaders ponder over his fate
Awaiting new news from Munich

03 Nov 2019

It's going to be a long day for Bayern Munich fans and leaders! Five goals in Manuel Neuer's net at Eintracht away sparked all the live alarms in Bavaria. Coach Niko Kovac had been on thin ice even before the blaze in Frankfurt, and now he is even more threatening to his own status. Especially, which is not very good on Rumenige.
It remains unknown whether the former Croatian national team will continue to work on the Bayern bench. It was very hot this morning at the Bayern training camp. Bild's photojournalists have immortalized the moment Niko Kovac enters training camp. He showed up at work shortly eight hours ago. He then held a 30-minute meeting with the players and went to training with the reservists.
So nothing out of the ordinary. Normal process after a championship game. However, Bild has learned that the Bayern administration is currently meeting and discussing next steps.
Ever since Bayern coach Niko Kovac has been under a lot of pressure. Executive Vice President Karl Heinz Rumenige and Sports Director Hasan Salihamidzic had no mercy even before Eintracht's visit. Part of the players are also dissatisfied with the season so far, as they believe that the parties are far from the Bayern renown.
The Bavarians currently have four points less than Mehengladbach and take fourth place in the Bundesliga.

BUNDESLIGA - Round 10
